attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the RNLI are Funded by people and there generous donations, as one off the 11 Public Services The government should fund the running of the RNLI as it would The Police Service, Fire and Rescue Service.
Every Year the crews of RNLI receive and rescue Thousands of people. To make this possible they need more help in funding cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
